```{r}
#separating race number and percent into two data frames
carteret.race.number <- carteret.race[seq(1, nrow(carteret.race), 2), ]
carteret.race.percent <- carteret.race[seq(2, nrow(carteret.race), 2), ]

write_csv(carteret.race.number, file = "./Data/Processed/carteret.race.number.csv")
write_csv(carteret.race.percent, file = "./Data/Processed/carteret.race.percent.csv")
```

```{r}
#map of greatest flood frequency and demographic data
carteret.shape <- st_read('./Data/Processed/carteret_tracts.shp')
carteret.flooding <- read.csv("./Data/Processed/Carteret_Flooding_Processed.csv")

#determining tract with max flooding: 980100
summary(carteret.flooding)

#join data frames
#careret

mapview(carteret.shape, zcol = "TRACTCE")
  
caretert.group <- carteret.race.number %>%
   pivot_wider(names_from = "depth", 
              values_from = "temperature_C")
  
  
  
  #Exercise 6: Spread temperatureC into more than one column based on the depth.
caretert.group <- carteret.race.number %>%
  pivot_longer(cols=c("White","Black or African American","American Indian and Alaska Native","Cherokee Tribal Grouping","Sioux Tribal Grouping","Asian","Asian Indian","Chinese","Filipino"),
               names_to='Race',
               values_to='Population')
```
